EventType.name: Work Logged On Issue
EventType.description: This is the 'work logged on issue' event.

EventType.name: Work Started On Issue
EventType.description: This is the 'work started on issue' event.

EventType.name: Work Stopped On Issue
EventType.description: This is the 'work stopped on issue' event.

EventType.name: Issue Comment Edited
EventType.description: This is the 'issue comment edited' event.

EventType.name: Issue Worklog Updated
EventType.description: This is the 'issue worklog updated' event.

EventType.name: Issue Worklog Deleted
EventType.description: This is the 'issue worklog deleted' event.

EventType.name: Issue Comment Deleted
EventType.description: This is the 'issue comment deleted' event.

EventType.name: com.exalate.api.domain.trigger.EXALATED
EventType.description: represents an event which is fired once the issue has been exalated

EventType.name: com.exalate.api.domain.trigger.UPDATED
EventType.description: represents an update event for the synchronized issue

EventType.name: com.exalate.api.domain.trigger.UNEXALATED
EventType.description: represents an event which is fired once the exalated issue has been unexalated

EventType.name: com.exalate.api.domain.trigger.DELETED
EventType.description: represents a delete event for the synchronized issue
